It was created to help you understand all aspects of company procedures and the benefits of being an EPAM employee. The Handbook covers many topics on which employees frequently have questions. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Employee Handbook is the main source of company rules and policies, so please make sure you read and understood its contents.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-error\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please remember to check the confirmation button at the bottom of this page after reading the handbook. I have no objections and I agree that any notifications from EPAM, as the Employer, relating to the Employee’s Handbook and/or my Individual Employment Contract shall be deemed to have been received, if they have been signed with qualified electronic signature and sent to my personal e mail address indicated in my Individual Employment Agreement. Translation in Latvian: Es apliecinu, ka man nav nekādu iebildumu un es piekrītu, ka jebkādi paziņojumi no EPAM, kā Darba devēja, saistībā ar Darbinieka rokasgrāmatu un/vai manu Individuālo darba līgumu, tiks uzskatīti par saņemtiem, ja tie būs parakstīti ar drošu elektronisko parakstu un nosūtīti uz manu personisko e-pasta adresi, kas ir norādīta manā Individuālajā darba līgumā.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]}}"
